Articles.Content:
You changed the course of Naval History....

(You're not aspie too are you? )

hahaha (NOT sarcastic)

How did I not see that. And for all those wondering, my plan will not be shown for a while because I'm busy at the moment.

Mind me, but please check my company page and tell me what you think (WARNING IMAGE HEAVY) tell me what still needs to be done. I have updated the first post

Edited February 13, 2015 by Zamovinar
Nice idea with the side mounted engines. It leaves them less exposed. For the naval cruiser. Hey, anybody know whats in store for 1.0?

RIP in inactivity

cmon guys post a tank battle or sumthin
Who has a tank here I can shoot at? I'm glad to post my tank too if yo want.
Would anybody like to test 1800 parts?

Would anybody like to test 1800 parts?

What is it? a naval ship or a starship? I can only run up to about 1200-1300 parts.

Starship. I want to finish it after leaving it to gather dust in December. Need someone to give me some bearings.

Edited February 14, 2015 by Spartwo

I can't run a 1800 part craft :/

- - - Updated - - -

Nice signature by the way can you name all the country balls? I don't know some of them..

Would anybody like to test 1800 parts?

As much as I'd love to play around with a ship that big the most my computer can take is around 1200 parts and that was Lag City.

Who has a tank here I can shoot at? I'm glad to post my tank too if yo want.

*starts to cry*

Did I not post a battle challenge with two panthers a while back? No one took the challenge.

Jeez guise, u hav thhe memory span of a goldfish

*starts to cry*

Did I not post a battle challenge with two panthers a while back? No one took the challenge.

Jeez guise, u hav thhe memory span of a goldfish

I know but during that time, I didn't have a working tank.

now I have.

Check my company page.

I have a light tank, medium and heavy tank.

LIGHT TANK

MEDIUM TANK (Yes she is amphibious)

Plus I've been busy on Kerbal Powers http://kerbalpowers.lefora.com/ at that time (RP game), I used it there. I didn't have a chance to to post it here properly.

It shoots properly too can be adjusted for short or long range. I'm still getting the hang of it's accuracy. I had to put landing gears at the back for recoil absorption during shell fire. The turret doesn't rotate. I still have to get my hands on that rotating turret, If I can make one.

SHORT RANGE

Edited February 15, 2015 by Zamovinar
I thought we told you to stop showing off, Zamovinar.
Sorry, I've updated it. I realized the page takes time to load. Anyways would you like to setup? or should I set it up? (But you gotta admit the missile launch pic was awesome haha)

Would anybody like to test 1800 parts?

I'd love to.

And Zamo, that tank looks good.

Edited February 15, 2015 by Mr Tegu

I'd love to.

And Zamo, that tank looks good.

It's the mainstay battle tank of the KRAKEN KORPS

Hmm. Prototype light scout vehicle armed with two hellfire missiles.

Good for crowd control and special operations.

Current missile range is 5 KM. Production Hellfires are expected to have an engagement range of at least About 8 KM.

Edited February 15, 2015 by andrew123

Hmm. Prototype light scout vehicle armed with two hellfire missiles.

Good for crowd control and special operations.

http://i.imgur.com/uOR2FmB.png

Current missile range is 5 KM. Production Hellfires are expected to have an engagement range of at least About 8 KM.

Whoa! this reminds me to make a light scout vehicle for the KRAKEN KORPS. But right now I'm developing a helicopter and a mech. Things to do are piling up now. I was out of ideas a few days ago.
I NEED TO MAKE BORT AND TANK caps sorry pls tutorial or example crafts pls

I NEED TO MAKE BORT AND TANK caps sorry pls tutorial or example crafts pls

When I was making my tank i didn't know how to start, I was slapping parts like a maniac, I didn't know what i was going for. Just try it. put some wheels on a part then from then on it will be easy even if you don't know what your making. It's trial and error.

May i join?

My computer can't handle more than 400 parts, but i'd love to engage in some low-part battles! I have some pretty good under-100-part ships that i'd like to put to the test!
I might make a remix of the ksp music..... #electromusic

May i join?

My computer can't handle more than 400 parts, but i'd love to engage in some low-part battles! I have some pretty good under-100-part ships that i'd like to put to the test!

Of course you can join! Welcome to the KSP Naval Battle Club!

I NEED TO MAKE BORT AND TANK caps sorry pls tutorial or example crafts pls
